level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Because of the enactment of subchapter II of Chapter 36 of Title 6 [subchapter II of Chapter 20 of Title 7, 2001 Ed.] by D.C. Law 12-215, the preexisting text [§§ 7-2001 to 7-2008, 2001 Ed.] has been designated as subchapter I.
DC CODE D. I, T. 7, Subt. I, Ch. 20, Refs & Annos
